name: eu-cohesion-beneficiaries
notes:
### About

Overview:

> All direct beneficiaries of European Cohesion policy have to be published by the Managing Authorities under the rules governing the implementation of the funds 2007-2013 (EC No 1828/2006). The information must contain the name of the beneficiary, the names of the operations and the amount of public funding allocated to the operations. This map provides direct links to the lists of beneficiaries of the European Regional Development Fund and the Cohesion Fund available on the respective websites in the Member States. Please note that the information below is "Work in Progress" and subject to ongoing updates based on information that the Commission receives from the Member States.

### Downloading

No bulk download. Points to external sites. Several broken links.

See EU Cohesion tag:

 * <http://ckan.net/tag/read/eu-cohesion>

### Openness

No information on re-usability. Points to many external sites, so may have to check with each publisher individually.
